posts.post_content:
Three great HOFers for sale.  Shipping included.  Paypal f/f or USPS money order.  Thanks for looking!

Evers Sovereign 350 Green Apple $200
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=199030&d=1438369863[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=199031&d=1438369874[/IMG] 

Evers Piedmont 150 $120  SOLD
(a few wrinkles/creases but really nice eye appeal) 

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=199390&d=1438643295[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=199391&d=1438643306[/IMG]

Walsh Sovereign 350 $165  SOLD
the little speck on the top right I believe to be tobacco.  Can most likely soak off if you were so inclined.  There is a light scratch to the right of his face.  The back has a bit of paper loss.  Obviously incredible eye appeal.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=199392&d=1438643319[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=199393&d=1438643329[/IMG]

Thanks for looking!
I'll take the Evers portrait and the Walsh.
